Title: Object: The Flag
Description: Black and white photograph of Tahrir square, Cairo, overlaid with figures painted in colour carrying flags. Oil on paper 2011.
School/style: Middle East & North Africa Modern Art
Curator's comments: Produced in response to the Arab Spring, Egypt 2011. Exhibition at ArtSpace and catalogue: My Family, My People 2012. The exhibition and Abla’s work was reviewed by Peter Aspden.The power of painting’ Financial Times May 12, 2012 http://www.ft.com/cms
Funder name: Funded by: Contemporary and Modern Middle Eastern Art acquisition group (CaMMEA)
